unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Two Way Tables: Shoes!
question_text:
Footwear Weekly magazine conducted a poll of college age, high school age, and middle school age young women about their favorite type of footwear.
What is the conditional probability that a young woman is in High School given that her favorite type of footwear is Ballet Flats?
tables:
Ballet FlatsHigh HeelsSandalsSneakersTotal

High School37337540185
College142638826319
Total193172218165748
